content.value:
I've always known what was next for me professionally. I may not have known where that might happen, if it meant advancement or a move, but I knew what progression looked like.

I have new projects, I learn new things, but I don't know what progression would look like now.
content.html: I've always known what was next for me professionally. I may not have known where that might happen, if it meant advancement or a move, but I knew what progression looked like. I have new projects, I learn new things, but I don't know what progression would look like now.
